text: Carlos Vicente Squeo (4 June 1948 in Dock Sud, Avellaneda – 8 September 2019) was an Argentine football defender. He played for several clubs in Argentina and Mexico and represented the Argentina national football team at the 1974 FIFA World Cup. Squeo died on 8 September 2019 at the age of 71.Falleció Carlos Squeo, exasistente de Miguel Ángel Brindisi en Barcelona SC ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine footballers
title: Carlos Squeo
